column1: Care to join the wife and me for a little 'bipartisanship'?
column3: Girl, you must be an Obama entitlement program. Because you are definitely raising my interest rate.
column4: Hey baby, how'd you like to see a REALLY Merry Xmas?
column5: Hey baby, wanna check out my big environmentally friendly wiener?
column6: Hey baby, wanna get liberal with each other?
column7: Hey girl, you're the only state in my union.
column8: Hey, baby, let's get together and bash bush
column9: Hey, let's go in the back and discuss politics!
column11: I got the stiffness of Al Gore and the stiffness of Bill Clinton...
column12: I'd really like to show you my new social program and redistribute some of my holdings.
column13: I'll enhance your peace, if you'll disarm my soldier.
column14: I'll make you scream like Howard Dean
column15: I'm gay but I want to be convinced otherwise.
column18: Let's go someplace and release our delegates
column19: May I check out your Bush?
column20: Now that's what I call a stimulus package
column21: Something's rising and it's not the national debt
column22: The GOP didn't like my stimulus package, but you will.
column23: Wanna form a more perfect union?
column25: Wanna practice some REAL gun control?
column26: Wanna pretend we're Republicans and have gay bathroom sex?
column28: You are sexier than Chelsea Clinton.
column29: Allow me to buy you a drink. After all, thanks to our beloved [insert a Republican political figure], the economy has never been better!
column31: Are you from a polling organization? Because I’d love to show you my hard numbers. (Scott Walker)
column32: Are you from a swing state? Because I’d love for you to swing my way. (Jeb Bush)
column33: Are you from Florida? Because you’re so hot you make my poll numbers rise. (Marco Rubio)
column34: Are you in the military? Because you even bring me to a full salute. (Rand Paul)
column35: Are you religious? Because I am the answer to all your prayers. (Mike Huckabee)
column36: Because of [insert a Republican political figure] leadership, we are strong; because of his vision, we will be even stronger; and because I can't stop thinking about your ass, I haven't been able to stand up for the last half hour.
column37: Check out my new Banana Republic shirt.
column38: Did you come from a Red State, because I'd love for you to be a taker.
column39: Did you just fall from heaven? Because you look like an angel donor. (Dr. Ben Carson)
column40: Didn't we meet at a Klan rally?
column41: Don't worry, babe, I'm not like the others!
column42: Don't worry, babe, those Executive Orders will never get used!
column43: Don't worry, babe, we'll extend the Bush tax cuts in time!
column44: Don't worry, babe, we'll make the Preezy enforce DOMA, you wait and see!
column45: Don't worry, babe, we'll overturn ObamaTAX!
column46: Don't worry, babe, we're serious about Fast & Furious!
column47: Drunk women are disgusting. By the way, I am going to win the drunk woman vote. (Donald Trump)
column48: Global warming obviously doesn't exist - YOU'RE the one heating up the place!
column50: Hey baby, can I see an ID. Not because I don't think you're old enough, but because I don't think you're white enough to be from around these parts.
column51: Hey baby, I'm 'bi-partisan' and I can swing both ways .... what are you?
column52: Hey, let's go strangle some kittens!
column53: How about I drop my pants and show you some shock n' awe.
column54: How about I leave no child behind... in your womb!
column55: I believe in the trickle down theory. So how about I trickle down the inside of your thigh?
column57: I HOPE you CHANGE your mind and give me a 15th chance! You won’t be disappointed. Have I ever lied to you?
column59: I may not be Bruce Springsteen, but I can still Rock your Vote! (Chris Christie)
column60: I wanna drill you like an Alaskan oilfield.
column61: I want to be near your vagina so much, I'll write laws about it.
column62: I won't tax that ass, because that's theft under threat of a gun, girl.
column63: I'd love to hang out with you, but I can't make it a late night -- I'm shipping out to [place] in the morning.
column64: I'm a uniter, not a divider. So how about you unite your mouth with my shlong.
column65: I'm all for No Child Left Behind. I'm even more for your child-like behind.
column66: I'm white, you're white - it can't just be coincidence!
column67: I’m a Republican. I love a good Bush. (Rick Perry)
column68: If I had to choose between having a Republican President in the White House, or never being able to see your cleavage again, I'd be stumped.
column69: Is that a RINO in your pocket, or are you happy to see me?
column70: Just as the Republican Party boldly confronts big challenges, nothing would please me more than you confronting the big challenge rapidly growing right now in my pants.
column71: Looking at you has been the only thing that's ever made me question abstinence education.
column72: Make like the surplus and go down on me.
column74: Sorry if I seem aggravated -- I'm still upset about that world-class jerk, Michael Moore.
column75: The Koch brothers bet me a million dollars! couldn’t strike up a conversation with the most beautiful girl here. Wanna buy some votes with their money? (Ted Cruz)
column76: The logo for our party is an elephant. Want to see what the elephant and I have in common?
column77: The Republican presidential debate is going to be like a singles bar full of unattractive men trying to get you drunk enough to vote for them
column78: The tattoo on my manhood spells 'RAN.' But when I get excited, it spells 'REPUBLICAN.'
column79: To see you naked, I would turn in my own mother to the Department of Homeland Security.
column81: Wanna find out why they call me a Repub-lickin'?
column82: Wanna see my collection of Ann Coulter books?
column83: When I ejaculate, you'll see a thousand points of light.
column84: Why do I want to fuck you? You're poor and I'm a Republican. Duh-doy!
column85: You got more curves than a NASCAR race track!
column86: You know, in this light you look like you could be Laura Bush's younger, more desirable sister.
column88: You must be a WASP because I want you to Bee mine.
column90: You're just like Ann Coulter, but without the penis!
